titles.title: To amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 respecting the scoring of preventive health savings.
To amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 respecting the scoring of preventive health savings.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Congressional Budget Office, upon receiving a request from Congress, to determine if legislation would reduce spending outside of the 10-year budget window through the use of preventive health and preventive health services.
